The Sand-Dweller is a monstrous, otherworldly creature known to serve the Great Old Ones, with a distorted resemblance to a koala bear. It dwells in desert caves and roams at night, preying on humans. Sand-Dwellers possess magical abilities, with a 30% chance of knowing one spell, and have average stats of 50-65. They are also known to play music that drives humans mad, affecting their sanity. Additionally, they can aid in summoning dark entities or gods, which can be costly in terms of magic points.
